scripts.fs:setup: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/docs dist/lib build/docs/markdown build/docs/wiki build/sdk/javascript/src
scripts.build:sdk: npx firebolt-openrpc --task sdk --source src --template src/template/js --output build/sdk/javascript/src --static-modules Platform --shared-schemas node_modules/@firebolt-js/schemas/src/schemas
scripts.build:docs: npx firebolt-openrpc --task docs --source src --template src/template/markdown --output build/docs/markdown --shared-schemas node_modules/@firebolt-js/schemas/src/schemas --as-path
scripts.build:wiki: npx firebolt-openrpc --task docs --source src --template src/template/markdown --output build/docs/wiki --shared-schemas node_modules/@firebolt-js/schemas/src/schemas
scripts.dist:declarations: npx firebolt-openrpc --task declarations --source src --template src/template/declarations/template.d.ts --output dist/lib/firebolt.d.ts --shared-schemas node_modules/@firebolt-js/schemas/src/schemas
scripts.test:setup: rm -rf test/transpiled-suite && npx tsc --target es6 --moduleResolution node --outDir test/transpiled-suite
scripts.test: npm run test:setup && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx --config=jest.config.json --detectOpenHandles jest
scripts.publish:word: mkdir -p dist/word/schemas && find dist/docs -iname "*.md" -type f -exec sh -c 'export fn=`basename ${0}` && pandoc "${0}" -o "dist/word/${fn%.md}.docx"' {} \;
scripts.everything: npm run fs:setup && npm run validate:each && npm run build:openrpc && npm run validate:assembled && npm run build:sdk && npm run dist:sdk && npm run dist:declarations && npm run test && npm run build:docs && npm run dist:docs
scripts.prepack: npm run fs:setup && npm run build:openrpc && npm run build:sdk && npm run dist:sdk && npm run dist:declarations
